sub_header: If we don't have our weekly session we suffer from withdrawal symptoms. And so, we invented RoleEver, and yes, we work on it full-time!
team_bio_header: RoleEver starts in 2018 from these 3 adventurers who have the bold ambition to make RPGs accessible to everyone, everywhere. Even during their coffee break.
team_bio_sub_header: The passion for RPGs is strong with us! Not a day goes by without thinking to the next game session :D
nick_the_dragon_bio: Nick is a Pseudodragon. Chief and undisputed master of RoleEver. Don't be fooled by the pose... he's a joker! It will guide you everywhere to the best adventures!

skills: Skill Monkey (no one understands what exactly he does)
Wizard (creates graphic illusions to convince everyone to follow us on social networks)
Cyber-man (programmer who comes from the future)
Barbarian (not temperamentally, but because he creates memes)

meta_header: RoleEver | The team behind the play by chat RPGs application!
